teamManagement.title: Team management
teamManagement.subtitle: Manage your team members and their account permissions here.

inviteMembers.title: Invite team members
inviteMembers.subtitle: Invite members to post or manage your organization

teamMembers.title: Team members
teamMembers.subtitle: Manage your existing team and change roles/permissions.

leaveDeleteModal.title: Delete member?
leaveDeleteModal.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete {memberName}? They will not be able to manage your organization anymore.

leaveModal.lastMemberSubtitle: You currently are the last member of this team. Unfortunately, this means you can't leave the team until you add another member.
leaveModal.assignMemberDescription: Choose another team member you trust and grant them rights. This will allow you to leave the team while ensuring someone remains to manage it.
leaveModal.deleteOrganizationDescription: If the organization is no longer needed, you can choose to delete it entirely.
leaveModal.defaultSubtitle: Are you sure you want to leave {teamName}?

closeAccount.title: Close account?
closeAccount.description: Closing your account will erase all your existing activity on Socious, including connections you’ve made, jobs and contracts.
closeAccount.placeholder: Please let us know why you are closing your account.

password.title: Password
password.description: Please enter your current password to change your password. If you have signed up via Google, please log out and use 'forgot password' to reset your password.

alerts.cantMatch: Your password cannot be the same as the current password

notification.title: Notification settings
notification.description: We may still send you important notifications about your account outside of your notification settings.

plan.title: Plan
plan.description: Manage your plan and payment details via Stripe.
